resources.string:
Volume Panel:
\u2022A flexible replacement for your system volume controls.

Designed & Developed By:
\u2022 Lee Bailey (AKA @LeeDrOiD)
Additional Thanks:
\u2022 The creators of App Intro.
\u2022 Ereza for Custom Activity On Crash.
\u2022 D-Max for Spots Dialog.
Translations By:
\u2022 Linar10 - Polish
\u2022 Fatih Firinci - Turkish
\u2022 guillerag - Spanish
\u2022 Nuno Nebeker - Portuguese
\u2022 Игорь Иринин - Russian
\u2022 Sylm - Français
\u2022 Emad Ayad - Arabic
\u2022 VM - German
\u2022 Alpert7 - Chinese
\u2022 Nguy\u1ec5n Lam - Vietnamese
\u2022 Michael Bekele(AKA Mikesew1320) - Amharic

Feel free to contact me via the \"Email Feedback\" option & don\'t forget to leave a review 😀

Accessibility Access 

This permission allows us to detect volume +\- key presses. 

No other content is captured. 

Some devices may require a reboot to start the service.
\u2022 Follow system Dark/Light mode. \n\u2022 Manufacturer support required.

Volume Panel is being optimised by the system & may be killed in the background.

None of the services in Volume Panel are battery intensive, but disabling optimisation will improve reliability.

Click \"Close\" to run optimised or click \"Action Now\" followed by \"All Apps\" then disable Battery Optimisation for Volume Panel.

If you find that the service is still being killed by the system, try enabling the "Force Keep Services Alive" Option.
ድምጽን ወደ ታች ረጅሙ ፕሬስ አግድ
\ u2022 ድምጽን + ጥራትን + የኃይል ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታዎችን ያስተካክላል።
i: Recalibrate Maximum Brightness: \n\u2022 Set your screen brightness to Max then long press here.
\ u2022 ሲነቃ ከሌሎች መተግበሪያዎች ጋር ጣልቃ ሊገባ ይችላል።

Do Not Disturb Access 

This permission allows us to modify Do Not Disturb Settings.

Only use this option if volume panel keeps stopping.

Some devices are too aggressive when freeing up memory and kill important services, applications with Admin rights are rarely killed.

Enabling basic Admin rights for Volume Panel will keep our services alive.

You will have to disable this option if you ever need to uninstall the app.
በእነዚህ መተግበሪያዎች ውስጥ \ u2022 የድምፅ ፓነል አይከፈትም።
መስኮት ማከል አልተሳካም ፣ እባክዎ መተግበሪያውን ይክፈቱ እና የማያ ገጽ ተደራቢ ፈቃዶች እንደተሰጣቸው ያረጋግጡ
ወደ ላይ / ታች ወደ ታች ያንሸራትቱ
የድምፅ ፓነል ነፃ በአሁኑ ጊዜ የስርዓት ክፍሉን ፓነል እየተሻረ ነው ፣ እባክዎ ግጭቶችን ለማስወገድ እባክዎ ያሰናክሉ።

The Volume Panel accessibility service has been stopped or removed by the system. \n\nIf this was not intentional, please try the \"Force Keep Services Alive\" option in the app and ensure battery optimisation is disabled for Volume Panel.
እባክዎ የቅርብ ጊዜውን ስሪት እየተጠቀሙ መሆንዎን ያረጋግጡ።
ፓነል-ተስተካክሎ እንዲሠራ ለማድረግ ፓነሎችን በረጅም ተጭነው ይጫኑት ፡፡

We may have detected a Button Remapping application. 

Button Remappers use accessibility services to detect button clicks. 

Other accessibility services capturing/customising volume button clicks will interfere with Volume Panels ability to intercept the volume buttons. 

Please consider disabling volume button customisation for those apps. 

Alternatively, enable the "Volume Panel" launcher shortcut and open it with a remap!
እንቅስቃሴ አልተገኘም ፣ እባክዎ ወደ ቅንብሮች ያስሱ እና በእጅ ይስጡት

Notification Access 

• This permission allows us to detect active Casting or Streaming. 
• If you wish to run without controlling cast streams, feel free to skip this permission. 

No notification content is captured.

Not all devices support splitting Notification, System & Ring volume.

If both sliders change together, this is due to your system configuration and nothing to do with Volume Panel.
ውይ .. የሆነ የሆነ ነገር የተበላሸ ይመስላል እና የድምፅ ፓነል የተበላሸ ፣ እባክዎን ለማሳወቅ ከዚህ በታች \ "ላክ ሪፖርት ያድርጉ" ን ይምቱ ፡፡
System Overlay \n\nThis permission is required for us to display the Volume Panel over other apps.

Permissions Required 

In order to override the system volume panel, several permissions are required. 

We will now show you several screens detailing those permissions, their usage & a button to enable them.
አንዴ እንደ ተጠናቀቀ ወደ መተግበሪያው ለመመለስ ተመለስን ተጫን።
የቅድመ እይታ ሞድ: የጥሪ እና የመውጫ ፓነሎች አስፈላጊ ሲሆኑ ሲታዩ ብቻ ነው

Enjoying Volume Panel.

Please leave a review in the play store!

\u2b50\u2b50\u2b50\u2b50\u2b50
የስርዓት ቅንጅቶችን ለመፃፍ የድምፅ ፓነል መዳረሻ መሰጠት አለበት ፣ እባክዎ ለመቀጠል ቀጥልን ይጫኑ። \ n
ማንኛውንም የተደራሽነት አገልግሎት በሚነቁበት ጊዜ ለአጠቃላይ ሰላምዎ የ Android ስርዓት ማስጠንቀቂያ ይቀርቡልዎታል ፣ የድምፅ ፓነል ሌሎች ቁልፎችን ወይም ይዘቶችን አይይዝም & ከበይነመረቡ ጋር የመገናኘት ፍቃድ የለውም ወይም ፍቃድ አይጠይቅም።

Tips:

Audio doesn\'t change in some apps:

Some apps like Instagram & Snapchat take complete audio focus & attempt to capture audio buttons them selves, if you experience this issue, please enable the \"Exclude Applications\" option and add the offending apps to the list.

The system audio panel keeps returning:

It\'s highly likely that your system is killing the Volume Panel accessibility service, if this happens, please make sure battery & memory optimisation is disabled for the app, enabling the \"Swipe Up/Down Trigger\" may help too.
For more information visit: http://www.dontkillmyapp.com/
\ u2022 ፓነል የሚጀምረው ድምጽ + ሲጫን ብቻ ነው።

Usage Access 

This permission allows us to detect the application currently in use via package usage stats & check if you have excluded it. 

If you wish to run without excluding applications, feel free to skip this permission.
ይህ መተግበሪያ ተለው hasል ፣ እና ወደ መጫወቻው ቦታ በመሄድ አይሄድም
አቀማመጥዎን ይምረጡ ከዚያ በ \ "ንድፍ \" ክፍሉ ውስጥ የፓነል ቀለሞችዎን ያበጁ።
Tip: Click here to enable Volume Panel accessibility services, this will allow the floating trigger & volume panel to be used in the lock screen.
This will overwrite your current layout, press proceed to continue.
